title: Scalable and Eco-Friendly Fabrication of Anti-Oil-Fouling Solar Interfacial Evaporator for Efficient Water Purification
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00346B, Paper
Jiaying Wang, Yuxia Xu, Yang Guo, Juan Wang
Solar-driven interfacial evaporation (SIE) is a promising avenue for clean water production, but its widespread application is hindered by challenges such as surface water contamination and the corrosive nature of...
